search

java.util.List<Card> search(CardQuery queryParameters)
                            throws DaoException
Searches for cards accordingly the parameters provided by queryParameters. If no card can be found, returns an empty List. Any exception thrown by the underlying implementation should be wrapped by a DaoException.

Throws:
DaoException

searchActiveCards

java.util.List<Card> searchActiveCards(java.lang.Long ownerId,
                                       java.lang.Long cardId)
Searches for cards with status != CANCELED where card owner = ownerId and card != cardId
